name: Zero Tools VCC Repository
author: Zero
description: A VCC repository containing Unity tools and utilities by Zero

2.1.1.name: com.zero.zero-tools
2.1.1.description: A collection of Unity Editor tools including Missing Scripts Finder, VRChat VRAM Checker, Package Installer, and other optimization utilities. Requires Unity 2022.3.22f1 or newer for modern API support.
